summary: This is a prison administrative record for Jeffrey Epstein dated July 29, 2019, documenting that he is pending a disciplinary hearing for a code 228 violation (self-mutilation) following a suicide attempt on July 23, 2019. The document appears to be part of a multi-page inmate record.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who is the subject of this prison administrative record, pending a disciplinary hearing for self-mutilation following a suicide attempt.

events.title: Epstein Suicide Attempt
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein attempted suicide while in custody.

events.title: Pending Disciplinary Hearing
events.description: Epstein is documented as pending a Disciplinary Hearing Officer (DHO) hearing for a code 228 violation (self-mutilation) related to the suicide attempt.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was documented as pending a disciplinary hearing for a code 228 violation (self-mutilation) on July 29, 2019.
The document explicitly states the reason for the pending hearing was a suicide attempt by Epstein on July 23, 2019.
The document is part of a multi-page inmate record, suggesting it is an official prison administrative document.
